oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mapp v. Board of Education brief for plaintiffs, 1962 February 16

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Brief filed by legal counsel for Mapp et. al. arguing that the Board of Education has faield to demonstrate why Chattanogoa, Tennessee public schools should not be integrated immediately, advocating desegregation at earliest date.
